name: Super Stacker Tower Defense
description:
***If the background on the main menu is black, enable hardware acceleration in your browser!***

Game Info

Place mines on glowing green ore to collect energy. Your spaceship generates a certain amount of energy by default.

Use energy to place towers on concrete foundations. Try to survive all 10 waves!

Controls:

LMB to select and place tower, RMB to deselect. Hold CTRL + LMB to place multiple towers.

Right click on certain towers (Ramp, Gate, or Battlement) to activate special abilities.

Credits:

  • Programming by BobKerman
  • Art and Game Design by DermitTheFregg

Contact
